ADDRESS: D.no. 3-105, Near Mutyalamma Temple, Rajanagaram MOBILE:9440895367 Settlement deed for immovable property worth Rs. 2,13,000/- dated 27-01-2026 in the name of Kothapalli Rajukumar (aged 24 years) (Aadhaar No. XXXX XXXX XXXX) son of Kothapalli Venkataraju garu, Rajanagaram Mandal, East Godavari District, Nandarada Village, Door No. 3-171 ... in the name of Kothapalli (late) Venkataraju garu, Kothapalli Lakshmi (aged 51 years) (Aadhaar No. XXXX XXXX XXXX) wife of Kothapalli (late) Venkataraju garu, Rajanagaram Mandal, East Godavari District, Nandarada Village, Door No. 3-171 No. XXXX XXXX XXXX) is the registered owner of the immovable property.
Kothapalli Lakshmi Nishani2
You have become my son. Therefore, out of my natural love for you and in return for that love, I intend to give you some immovable property and hereby grant you this immovable property worth Rs. 2,13,000/-, free of charge, including the vacant land of 141.35 sq.m. as per the schedule below, which has been my ancestral property and has been in my possession and possession since that date, and which has been in my complete possession and enjoyment from that date to this day. Therefore, all rights in the said property are hereby vested in you and the said property is hereby acquired by you with full rights on this very day. Therefore, from now on, you shall have full rights in the said property and shall pay all government taxes, etc. payable on the said property, and you, your sons and grandsons, descendants I hereby give you this settlement deed, stating that the property is undisputed and unencumbered by any other person, and that it is not subject to any purchase, purchase agreement, mortgage, guarantee, court seizure, shareholding or any other transaction whatsoever. I hereby give you this settlement deed, stating that the particulars in this schedule are correct and that I have full authority to give you the property free of charge. The property is not an assigned property by the Government. Kothapalli Lakshmi Nishani629

boundaries.boundaryS: Dara Veerababu Open Site, 32.9 Sq. Ft

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 629 of 2026, dated 28/Jan/2026, executed by Kothapalli Lakshmi in favour of her Son, Kothapalli Rajukumar towards the property admeasuring an extent of 141.35 Sq. Yds, bearing house number 3-86, comprised in survey number 339/10, situated in Nandarada Village & Gram Panchayat, Rajanagaram Mandal, within the District of East Godavari, registered at sub-registrar office Rajanagaram, is bounded as follows: North by: Panchayathi Road, 31.5 Sq. Ft South by: Dara Veerababu Open Site, 32.9 Sq. Ft East by: Dara Venkanna House, 39.6 Sq. Ft West by: Panchayathi Road, 40.9 Sq. Ft Note: Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per recitals of the deed.
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
